nodes.title: ARM Mali: Don't use GL_MULTISAMPLE or GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH on ES
implemented clip() and noClip() for FX2D
Output java files in UTF-8 and force compiler to use UTF-8
Fix 3D on contemporary versions of Linux (fixes #5308)
fix NPE when closing sketch window on Mac (#5214)
Make un/registering methods in PApplet thread-safe
cursor() sets the cursor visible, fixes #5330
Bug loadImage(): Managing files without extension
Fix error checker crash when className contains [ or ]
Make menu separators visible on linux with the GTK look and feel
Fix scrub comments for empty block comment /**/
PDE UI fonts are ugly outside of editor area
A fix for the window resizing problem in Windows
Unlock "Create Movie" in Movie Maker after use
Add more build products to linux/.gitignore
Workaround issues with Raspbian release August 2017
Add support for custom icon file for macOS builds
Add JavaFX runtime to error checker class path
Fix comment/uncomment adding slashes at wrong indent
Fix bugs in line vert shader
Fix #5165. Wrong tab for missing brace
Adding copy constructor to the class PVector
Refactor to use a few Java 8 features
add install / uninstall scripts for linux a-la-Arduino + correct mime types for IDE
Fix 3391 - Gray halo around offscreen buffers
Fixed typos and grammar in French translation
Update ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md to redirect Processing 4 questions
Replaced generic file icon with a file icon with processing icon on it
Resolves #6082, zoom in/out with scroll wheel
Added the ability to increases font size by moving the scroll wheel while pressing ctrl, fixes #6082
Fixes color selector menu name in PDE_pt.properties
getShape() - Type of vertex was wrong for Cubic
loadJSONObject/Array() now return null if the given file was not found
update issue template -- correct forum link
Tint on FX2D now works properly, and improved JavaFX/Scenebuilder integration
Added hsb() and rgb() helper functions
Fix PGraphicsJava2D.copy() when src is of same class
load mode strings into language bundle
Add new strings to Ukrainian translation
Added translate function that accepts a PVector
Change method name 'sadness' to 'printError', 'loop' to 'enableLooping', 'list' to 'getFonts', 'available' to 'getNextActiveClients', 'paint' to 'setTextSelection', 'empty' to 'getSketchInstance'
FIX Library never appears installed Issue
Updated to ANTLR 4 with Java 8 Syntax
fix mouseY not reaching 0 and general improvement on MouseEvent.EXIT
trash solution for color method and give posibility to naming a variable color
Fix bug with control-click for RIGHT on Mac OS, addresses #5765
Making the ThinkDifferent classes be JDK version-independent. JDK 9…
Rewrite table model in contrib manager to fix #5524
Added method setMinimumSize(int x, int y) : void
Added method setMinimumSize(float x, float y) : void
Fix freeze when restarting sketch with variables in size
Recreate FBOs when offscreen PGraphicsOpenGL is resized
Fix vertex buffer initialized with wrong number of components
Stop frame rate counter from exaggerating
[WIP][Untested] Make array helpers use arrays of generics
Make sure Ctrl+Left Mouse on MacOS is consistent
Fixes #5246 by overriding getPreferredSize and setting height to 0.
Fix #5317: Modifier keys not recognized with FX2D
Revert "Fix 3D on contemporary versions of Linux (fixes #5308)"
Fixes blend mode not being set correctly, fixing #5645.
Fix for #5625 - Made tab widths consistent across renderers
Updated russian translation, now can choose russian in preferences
Shows a warning when createFont can't find a named font (#5481)
IO: Add ADS1X15 Analog-to-Digital converter example
OpenGL ES: Fix GLSL version number for 1.00 (#5582)
Fixed issue #5573 about color(...) thread safety
Add a simple extended error message (#4646)
Handle characters with shift modifiers in FX2D (#5317)
Added a rotate(angle, x, y) shortcut for rotating around a given point
IO: Implement Raspbian-only method for setting pull{up,down} resistors
Fixed a crash occuring while loading certain SVGs exported from Adobe Illustrator
Make sure Java2D is backed by INT_ARGB image
Setting view, viewInv and cameraPos uniforms to shaders by default #5504
Enable exporting of Windows applications on ARM (#5287)
Make sure editor is updated after reloading changes
Fix sketch exception getting hidden by warning
